regen.absent_element: handling of temperatures that do not exceed limits
regen.new_specification: The system shall output temperatures for subsequent analysis if they do not exceed the limits.
If LO <= T <= UO, the THEMAS system shall output the temperature value for subsequent processing.

regen.absent_element: returning temperatures that do not exceed limits for further processing
regen.new_specification: If LO <= T <= UO, then the THEMAS system shall output the reported temperature for subsequent processing.

label: If LO<=T<=UO then the THEMAS system shall recognize the temperature limit has not been exceeded, then this process shall output the temperature status
absence: situation of temperatures within the limits
